description: Updated with an "RL" turtleneck, this Polo Bear's outfit is inspired by an iconic photograph of Mr. Lauren that was used in a denim advertising campaign.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27.5" body length (front and back), an 18.5" shoulder, a 44.5" chest, and a 34.75" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Polo Bear, "Polo Bear by Ralph Lauren," and "Ralph Lauren" script printed at the center front.
Shell: cotton, polyester. Cuffs and hem: cotton, elastane.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
